headline: Constellation says Trump’s immigration crackdown is hurting sales of Modelo, Corona
summary: Deportation threats and the potential of job losses have led to decreased spending among Hispanic consumers, who make up half of the company's beer sales.

raw.headline: Constellation says Trump’s immigration crackdown is hurting sales of Modelo, Corona

headline: Constellation Brands 'understands both sides of the border,' CEO says
summary: Constellation Brands (STZ) is in focus after the company, which makes Modelo and Corona beers, issued a weaker-than-expected outlook. Constellation Brands CEO Bill Newlands joins Madison Mills and Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi to discuss navigating ongoing uncertainty as a US company that makes many of its products outside of the US. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.

headline: Prada to acquire Versace, CarMax reports mixed Q4 results: Morning Buzz
summary: The major averages were sharply lower near noon, curtailing some of yesterday’s sharp gains after President Donald Trump announced a 90-day pause on some of his “reciprocal” tariffs, despite announcing an increase on the cumulative tariff rate on Chinese imports. Despite the temporary relief from the tariff suspension, market sentiment remains cautious. Looking to commodities, gold prices are up significantly, approaching the $3,200 threshold.
